```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = TRUE,
	message = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE
)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
data(rest_inspec)

no_of_cuisine = rest_inspec %>% 
  group_by(cuisine_description) %>% 
  count()

ggplot(no_of_cuisine) + 
  geom_col(aes(x = reorder(cuisine_description, -n), y = n)) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1, size = 8), 
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10)) + 
  labs(x = "Cuisine", y = "Number of restaurants", title = "Number of orders and correspoding aisles in descending order") +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 90000, by = 5000))
  
```
